pd_0_com_0text: Udo, we’ve tracked him to Khaloof and have satellite coverage of the planet. We should be able to provide you with his location every so often as the satellite passes over that side of the planet. You just need to get to the markers on time to catch him. He’s just landed on the planet so you shouldn’t be too far behind him. We’ve marked it with a blue marker. Get there as soon as you can.
